source: Nevada County Library - Kids & Teens Calendar

sample_events.title: Stay & Play
sample_events.description: Caregivers and their little ones are invited to join us for time to play, learn, sing, read, and have fun together

sample_events.title: Baby Storytime
sample_events.description: Short story time filled with rhymes, songs, and stories

sample_events.title: Paws to Read
sample_events.description: Practice reading aloud with a therapy dog

sample_events.title: Dungeons and Dragons Club
sample_events.description: Come level up cooperative skills, share creativity, and forge friendships through play

sample_events.title: Classic Monster Movie Showcase
sample_events.description: Spooky fun for film fans of all ages

sample_events.title: Wild About Wool in Truckee
sample_events.description: Learn how fun and easy felting can be. Find a new project for inspiration each week. All supplies are provided and all skill levels are welcome

sample_events.title: Build, Make, Play
sample_events.description: Join us and let's have fun creating, building, and learning together

sample_events.title: English Conversation Group
sample_events.description: Weekly conversation group for English language learners to learn, improve and practice their English speaking skills

sample_events.title: Tech Drop In
sample_events.description: Help with devices, computer questions, and library digital services

sample_events.title: LEGO Club
sample_events.description: Library provides LEGOs and weekly building challenges

sample_events.title: Storytime with Teacher Jacky
sample_events.description: Storytime in English and American Sign Language
